ModMetaData.name: Natural Farms
ModMetaData.author: sindre0830
ModMetaData.description:
A simple mod that adds farming paths and small streams to the game.
This is an addon to Natural Paths.
Farm path stats - Cost: Nothing - Work to build: 150 (50% longer than concrete) - Walk speed: 100% - Flammability: 0% - Beauty: 0
Small stream stats - Cost: Nothing - Work to build: 150 - Walk speed: 93% - Terrain requirement: Diggable - Beauty: 2
README: The only way to remove the stream after it has been built is by placing a moisture pump, just like the shallow water in vanilla.
